title: Britt Reid, Son of Kansas City Coach Andy Reid, Sentenced to Three Years
description: Britt Reid, a son of Kansas City Coach Andy Reid, was sentenced to prison for severely injuring a 5-year-old girl in a drunken driving crash. Her family has railed against the plea deal reached in a football-mad city.
dc:creator: Joe Drape
media:credit: Chase Castor for The New York Times
media:description: “My daughter is going to have to live with what he has done for the rest of her life,” Felicia Miller said. Miller requested that Ariel’s face not be shown in photographs.
